verses.verse: And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hanani <S%H2607><s%> the seer <S%H2374><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> Shouldest thou help <S%H5826><s%> the ungodly, <S%H7563><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H2063><s%> is wrath <S%H7110><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> there are good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thee, in that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast taken away <S%H1197><s%> the groves <S%H842><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and hast prepared <S%H3559><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and he went out <S%H3318><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> through the people <S%H5971><s%> from Beer-sheba <S%H4480><s%> <S%H884><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and brought them back <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And he set <S%H5975><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the fenced <S%H1219><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> by city, <S%H5892><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the judges, <S%H8199><s%> Take heed <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> do: <S%H6213><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye judge <S%H8199><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for man, <S%H120><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who is with <S%H5973><s%> you in the judgment. <S%H1697><s%> <S%H4941><s%>

Wherefore now <S%H6258><s%> let the fear <S%H6343><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you; take heed <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> it: for <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> nor respect <S%H4856><s%> of persons, <S%H6440><s%> nor taking <S%H4727><s%> of gifts. <S%H7810><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> did Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and of the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and of the chief <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and for controversies, <S%H7379><s%> when they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And he charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> faithfully, <S%H530><s%> and with a perfect <S%H8003><s%> heart. <S%H3824><s%>

And what cause soever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7379><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> you of your brethren <S%H4480><s%> <S%H251><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their cities, <S%H5892><s%> between <S%H996><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> and blood, <S%H1818><s%> between <S%H996><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> and commandment, <S%H4687><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> ye shall even warn <S%H2094><s%> them that they trespass <S%H816><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and so wrath <S%H7110><s%> come <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and upon <S%H5921><s%> your brethren: <S%H251><s%> this <S%H3541><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> and ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> trespass. <S%H816><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Amariah <S%H568><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> matters <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> matters: <S%H1697><s%> also the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be officers <S%H7860><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you. Deal <S%H6213><s%> courageously, <S%H2388><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the good. <S%H2896><s%>
